channel.title: Lost Adoration (Amazing base wonderful ideas)
channel.description:
I am looking for a Development team that will; A) Work together as a team B) Rarely fight disagree argue C) Commit to the Server B) Stay with us for a long period of time
This server could be hosted right now and gain a large player base in a short amount of time, so I hope that having a development team will make the server even better than it already is.
I am looking for;
Website Developer Client sided ( i.e customs adding ints and adding animations to armor) Server sided coder (i.e someone who can help me out when i'm stuck)
I have alot of content but need to tie up some loose ends. I started adding summoning I want to add Dungeoneering will be our own custom Make our own Items i.e Customs but not ugly ones 100% ge just need to add collecting Move ge to correct coords This source is very clean and easy to work with Thankyou for your time if you wish to join this team then please contact me through pm or through skype frost.rsrevamped Regard, Frost

Auraeus - A new beginning

Maybe post some of your ideas and details about your base?
